name: Hexa Faction
description:
Hexa Faction is a puzzle game where you play against a hexabot and need to run him out of options to defeat him.

Each level has hexa polygons where the players make their moves. Victory is achieved once you have created obstacles around the bot player in the way so he can not make further moves. You can choose the hexagon onto which you wish to move by simply clicking on it.

Levels get harder and harder and the hexa bot gets more and more difficult to block! Sharpen your brain and have a good blocking!
